value.title: StarCraft 2: OLD SCHOOL STRATEGIES! (PartinG vs TY)
value.excerpt: Very fun best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2. In this series we see a variety of strategies from especially the Terran player. Protoss is forced to respond to cheeky Barracks placements, Thor drops and other aggressive Terran build orders.  Get more videos & support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
